title.rendered: Hot New Inventory + Ellijay Ribbon Cutting

content.rendered:
New Stock… at USED Prices… in Time for Christmas

Hundreds and hundreds of new titles in children, audio, young adult, and nonfiction sections are hitting our shelves this week just in time for the holidays. Here is a sneak peek at some of the titles.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Packing Up for D.C.

That’s a lot of books! Stay tuned for more updates about D.C. during the month of December.

 

 

 

 

Ribbon Cutting in Ellijay, GA!

Walls of Books Ellijay held its grand opening on Tuesday! We had a great time at the ribbon cutting and are excited about this new Walls of Books Location. Take a look at that Narnia cake!
